channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Teamcenter V12.4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Teamcenter V12.4

item.title: CVE-2022-24290|2024-08-03T04:07:02.458Z -- siemens -- teamcenter%20v12.4
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Teamcenter V12.4 (All versions < V12.4.0.13), Teamcenter V13.0 (All versions < V13.0.0.9), Teamcenter V13.1 (All versions), Teamcenter V13.2 (All versions < V13.2.0.8), Teamcenter V13.3 (All versions < V13.3.0.3), Teamcenter V14.0 (All versions < V14.0.0.2). The tcserver.exe binary in affected applications is vulnerable to a stack overflow condition during the parsing of user input that may lead the binary to crash.
